title: "He Was Oppressed, and He Was Afflicted, Yet He Opened Not His Mouth" («Il a été maltraité et opprimé et il n'a pas ouvert la bouche»), plate XXI from Miserere
medium: Aquatint and drypoint over photogravure from an illustrated book with 22 aquatints over photogravure (19 with drypoint, 18 with roulette, five with etching)
